title: One for All is meant to be fun
body: Kindly go to a doctor and have the stick up your ass removed before coming into this game mode and raging like a lunatic.

replies.body: Its horrendous how some people start intentionally feeding just because they didn't get their chosen champion in lottery pick.

Geez this happened today when we got Bard. One guy just complained all game about what a crap pick it was. Meanwhile, we're just running around collecting chimes and getting doubles and triples(yes you read right, double and triple kills as Bards, against Talons no less).
Dude, everyone knows bard is the best champion in the game, that filthy blasphemer has not been touched by the cosmic wonder of the bearded space cushion.
{{champion:432}} *hums in agreement*

I had a Nunu team vs a Bard team, my opening line was "Let's snowball to victory"

We snowballed to victory

happened to me as well, but with less of a happy ending. 3 of them built attack speed on him, the other guy built {{item:1029}} and {{item:2049}} (not bad items, but not all that helpful at that point) and I was the only one who built anything useful for bard. They all complained about it being a stupid champ to pick and as soon as I called them out on their crap Items, one guy rage quit and I never heard another peep out of them till the end of the match.

Wow. you're much better than I am. Whenever I end up in a bard 1 for all, I just get {{item:1326}} and run around the map claiming that I'm a pokemon trainer
I did this with Yorick. Q was Squirtle, W was Bulbasaur and E was Charamander. If you're wondering why, it's because of the colour palette XD.
I sadly went bard vs zac. Epic escape vs epic gap closer didnt go to well but hell bard is the most fun ive had in one for all
I think they need to add a "tryhard" queue for featured game modes.  That would get rid of most of the raging from the games of people that just want to have fun.
But then the tryhards will select noob que so that their tryhard butt can whoop up on all the nontryhards

Not necessarily, by "tryhard" I mean it would almost be like ranked for featured game modes. It doesn't necessarily mean one queue has better players than the other, it just means one group plays more serious than the other.
Yes, but what I'm saying is the tryhard will then be like, "oh look, a que for people that don't play serious. I'm going to go join that que so that I can play super serious and win all my games".
That may happen but then they would be the ones raging because they have a team that is just goofing off.

Sooooo, no difference between that and now?

We've come full circle with no difference lolol.

Well it would be different people raging...lol..
I just want people to not troll in the draft pic for someone that is almost guaranteed to lose the game.

You're said want to get rid of the raging tryhards first. Then I said these tryhards would just join same que. You said they would then rage at bad teammates. Unless I misunderstood something, how is it different people raging? I thought we were talking about the same group of tryhards the entire time.

And people troll in all game modes. They will continue to do so until rito starts actually addressing the issue :).
My first post was the people who weren't the tryhard raging, after that it was the tryhard raging.
Dude, that's perfect.

>
> Kindly go to a doctor and have the stick up your ass removed before coming into this game mode and raging like a lunatic.

Could not have said it better myself =)
It's fun until you forget to ban heimerdinger...
can confirm. disgusting as f :D

To be fair, every mode is supposed to be fun. Though people really need to relax in this mode, I just played a match as all {{champion:37}} vs {{champion:76}}. I started the match thinking we where screwed (even more so since one person never played sona). By the end of the match, we just stayed huddled up, spamming every skill we had and we became the equivalent of one OP Mega Tank that was acing the enemy as fast as they could re-spawn.

Its interesting how teams have to adjust their strategies against certain picks. I was in a zed vs sona game and although us zeds butchered the sonas early, late game, they took up the sonasquad strat and became completely unkillable straight out. What my zed team ended up doing was mass waveclearing and pushing every single lane. It was impossible for the sonas to deal with them all so in the end, they fell.

That was a bloody good game.

See i post a thread asking Riot to ban these people and intentional feeders and AFKers permanent from Featured Game Modes and everyone tells me im being too harsh... This is a game meant to be played for fun, the reason these people like to ruin fun is because they get away with it. If there is a permaban from Featured Game Modes i guarantee less people will act like assholes.

It is a bit harsh to be honest. People can report you for no reason at all just so you get banned from these games so it also brings it's fair share of problems. Honestly like someone said before, It'd be better if Riot created 2 queues for featured games. Like one normal queue and one "ranked" queue, that way all the try hards would just go  there.

Wow its like everyone thinks one report will ban you :( thats not what im talking about im talking about being reported enough to deserve a ban, but this is a Featured Game Mode not a normals so you can't really ban them from normals (unless they are seriously toxic). Obviously with enough reports you will get a ban, because this is an on-going thing with you so to prevent further toxicity you are banned from all Featured Game Modes until you can prove you reformed. They do it one game mode they will do it in the next and the one after that, toxic people are toxic, remove them from those of us that want to have fun. Thats all i ask.

Yeah sure, except the term toxic is defined loosely. Getting __ reports doesn't mean toxicity. You play Yorick? 
*Defeat*
"reportyorick"
"troll"
"You have been reported for verb abuse bla"
Yeah, it does nothing but still that kinda stuff is bs.
With game modes like this, you will always get people that don't know how to play champs.  You can't ban everyone that doesn't main X champ.  You're just resorting to their level.

Ok well obviously Riot wont ban those people... I think its somewhat obvious when someone is feeding (say they have 3 Mobi boots and are constantly dying under turret or in the exact same spot near the opponents side) and when someone is bad (their build is bad but not totally off, they die throughout the lane).
And now you know why featured Game Modes aren't permanent.
If you want to play a certain champ, play a different game mode. I am tired of people dodging or feeding because they didn't get the champ they wanted.
I've found it never helps to complain or be negative about other people.  It only feeds the problem.

Yeah, but just shutting up and not telling them something just causes it to fester and get out of control. I'll admit I could have made this thread a lot more tasteful but I was frustrated and had to let some of it out.

One for All is meant to be fun

If you pick your main X champion you are a really bad person, dumpster over a guy who is on the first game on a champ won't help you when player on their mains will kick your a*s in your nest norma or ranked games
I wonder if anyone decided to go all Teemo yet.

It's been done earlier this week; however, both Teemo and Karthus have been disabled for the mode atm due to issues. Though...I feel they're not as bad as some of the others.

Getting sick of all the Zeds, Yasuos and other crowd favourites.

Actually those champions got disabled because they were too obnoxious to play against in the last OFA. They usually do this to especially ridiculous champions in modes such as these. The good times of Pre-Rework Soraka in URF were the best...until they disabled her for the other URF game modes...then ultimately re-worked her.

I doubt they both got disabled due to "issues" lol.

But Teemo can be a pain. My friend said that the last time this happened, they made the game go over an hour and a half because 2 of the Teemos would go on attack while the other 3 would just lay down shrooms all over the map.

Im surprised we are not seeing all Leblancs or Juggernauts or something like that.
Although it isn't a reason to rage, feed, etc.  You have to admit, it's extremely haRd to have fun vs a full team of brands, lux, etc.

Sure I get that but, and I'm not saying to just give up, but have some fun with it. If you're Soraka and up against a team of Lux's just try some crazy thing you never would do. My big bro had this game they all decided to troll mid, of course they got smashed but they at least had fun while losing.
I've experienced the most toxic players in thise game mode by far, almost every game someone is pissed off:/ so sad
Annie is great to play. nothing like a team fight that pops up 5 tibbers :D

Yes it is meant to be fun but why are you gonna pick {{champion:432}} if

1. You do not own the champ
2 Have never played the champ before
3 Have absolutely no idea anything about the champ 

You can have fun i agree and i have played champs that really i own but never really play and am not very good at but at least ill try, i got to play {{champion:7}} whom i recently bought just because i had spare ip and not many champs left to buy and it was only my second time playing her EVER.  I played {{champion:157}} for only the second time also had no idea what to do and sucked but ok i didnt pick either of them.

My point is it is ok to suck and try to have fun with a champ that you may be very weak on or have never played but dont go out of your way and pick them because 

"THIS MODE IS JUST FOR FUN"

Cause really you are ruining it for the other 4 on your team.

I have seen so many people try to pick {{champion:203}} or say lets play {{champion:203}} but they dont own the champ and really have no clue but may have heard they are op/broken but then get in game and all i hear from others that have been forced into that kind of game is well {{champion:203}} sucks on All for one and especially when you got 4 people who have no clue how to play the champ.

I am also not saying just pick the same champs over and over, i have almost 25 games and most of them i have seen different champs, only 7 champions have i seen more than once 

Blitz
Darius
Annie
Kindred
Yorick
Bard
Leona

I guess i am lucky in that respect but i tend to pick different champs every game just to try them out, I really dont care who i get for the most and try to have fun but its hard when you get 1 idiot picking a champ that they have no clue about and its the one who is chose, i guess people are gonna have to start going in 3 man groups and talking about who to play before hand to stop the idiocracy.
I've tried the gamemode three times and haven't had any enjoyment from it.
People got so mad when i picked {{champion:78}} . Sure we lost, but we all had fun. nothing is funnier than 5 {{champion:78}} charging 5 {{champion:36}} .

Just because you might have fun as a Bard going 0/19/4 against a full team of Heimers doesn't make it fun for everyone else. I get that its supposed to be a just for fun game mode, but getting roflstomped the second you get to lane isn't fun for some people. And people are intentionally troll picking the absolute worst champions they can think of when they queue with their friends for the majority vote.

So 8 games out of ten you get your ass handed to you on a platter because you get stuck playing Taric vs Darius or something equally impossible. Its only fun if both teams stand a chance. One sided stompfests aren't fun.
Its like URF where after 2 days everyone picked the most tryhard possible team.
i know right people are taking it serious and there is no fun lol
